tool.name: Filter uncorrect PE reads from Rcorrector
tool.command: ln -s '$input1' input_1.fq && ln -s '$input2' input_2.fq && python $__tool_directory__/FilterUncorrectabledPEfastq.py -1 input_1.fq -2 input_2.fq -o fixed 2>&1 > rmunfixable.log && cat rmunfixable.log
tool.help:
What is FilterUncorrectabledPEfastq?
It removes uncorrectable paired-end reads from a Rcorrector result file.
